branchCategory.name: NC(D)MR, Stainless Steel Cylinder, Direct Mount, Double Acting, Single Rod
branchCategory.description: <p>Direct mount (block mount) standard double acting single rod version of our NCM stainless steel cylinders. A wear ring extends the seal life and a bronze rod bushing is standard on all bore sizes. The NCM is auto-switch capable without any change in cylinder dimension. Bore sizes range from 7/16" to 1 1/2" and standard strokes from 1/2" to 12". </p>
